resources.string: You are locked until the next SET has been called
That is no set, you are locked until the next SET has been called
A SET consists of three cards
You found a valid SET. These three cards have been added to your score.
This is not a valid SET. In Multiplayer Mode you would now be locked until the next SET has been called.
The objective of this game is to find as many SETs as possible. A SET consists of three cards with special properties as explained below.
The game is played with 81 cards. Each card has four properties which can have three values each:

Color: red, green or blue
Shape: clubs, hearts or diamonds
Number: one, two or three
Filling: empty, half or full
A valid SET consists of three cards which are either all equal or all different in each of these four properties. This is an example of a valid SET.
This is not a valid SET, because two of these cards are green and one is blue. This tutorial will help you learn how to recognize valid SETs.
If you have found a SET, press the SET button and select the cards of the SET you found. Then press the button again to confirm.
If you cannot find any SET, press this button to deal three additional cards. Up to 21 cards can be in the game at the same time. 21 cards always contain at least one SET.
There are no valid SETs left in the game. Final Score:
